hints.label: lem-entropy-l1-bound
hints.title: Entropy $L^1$ Bound
hints.raw_directive:
3789: **Lemma (Entropy moment bound)**:
3790: 
3791: :::{prf:lemma} Entropy $L^1$ Bound
3792: :label: lem-entropy-l1-bound
3793: 
3794: For any $\rho, \rho_\infty \in \mathcal{P}(\Omega)$:
3795: 
3796: $$
3797: \int \rho \left|\log \frac{\rho}{\rho_\infty}\right| \le 2 D_{\text{KL}}(\rho \| \rho_\infty) + C_{\text{const}}
3798: $$
3799:
